description: An election this weekend in Italy could return a familiar figure to power: Silvio Berlusconi. The official news agency in China is reporting that the government will tax carbon emissions. Boeing representatives are meeting with officials from the Federal Aviation Administration today to hash out when the grounded 787 Dreamliners can get back in the air. Every day the planes are on the ground is a costly day for Boeing.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, February 22, 2013
teaser: An election this weekend in Italy could return a familiar figure to power: Silvio Berlusconi. The official news agency in China is reporting that the government will tax carbon emissions. Boeing representatives are meeting with officials from the Federal Aviation Administration today to hash out when the grounded 787 Dreamliners can get back in the air. Every day the planes are on the ground is a costly day for Boeing.
byline: Jeremy Hobson, Sabri Ben-Achour, David Weinberg, Sam Beard, Will Oremus, Janell Burley Hofmann, John Sudworth, Christopher Werth and Karen Clark
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, February 22, 2013
